entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming northeast 30 after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
